title: The Witcher 3 GOTY + HD Reworked Project repack Mr DJ
description: If you want to support me , feel free to send some Bitcoins in my BTC wallet : 1DdCpV8LfDXNWAszfrEbA7cXJ8sYoSv4fi The Witcher 3 GOTY + HD Reworked Project [v 1.31 + 18 DLC] + Bonus repack Mr DJ LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ Repack features: Nothing cut/recoded; Game version : 1.31 ; Voice Language included : English ; Install Time - 30 minutes ; Subtitles Laguages : English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Turkish ; Final size: 35.9 gb; Crack based on: None (GOG) ; ALL 16 free DLCs and 2 Expansions Hearts of Stone and Blood & Wine are included , read Instructions.txt file for details . Included Bonus Content : -Artworks -Avatars -Comics -Papertoy Catalog -Papertoys -Videos v2 -Wallpapers -Official Soundtracks It is optional to download the 'bonus' folder , unselect it in your torrent client if you don't want it and save 1.21 GB . You can also unselect 'The Witcher 3 HD Reworked Project' folder and save 735 MB if you don't want to install any mods and just want the normal GOTY edition . Repack size for game only is 31 GB . Note : The Witcher 3 HD Reworked Project 5.0fix - This project aims to improve the graphics in the game Witcher 3, by reworking models and textures, to a higher quality. Installing it is is optional . https://www.nexusmods.com/witcher3/mods/1021/? 'The Witcher 3 HD Reworked Project 5.0fix.exe' has been separately provided in 'The Witcher 3 HD Reworked Project' folder . After installing the game , you can use this installer to install the HD mod for you . Just specify the same location in the installer where you installed the game . I have also separately provided the same Halk's Ultra HD Config files in '4k textures' folder in the game directory in case you don't installed it via the mod installer , if you need it later , just copy the 'bin' folder inside it and paste it over your vanilla bin folder in the game directory. In case you want to revert to the original , 'Config backup' folder contains the original 'bin' folder , copy and paste it , it provides very high quality textures which you need to enable from the in game options .... After installing the mod , go to 'Video' settings , 'Graphics' option and set 'Texture Quality' to '#preset_value_Halk Ultra HD' .... **INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS: Install as you always do , beginners read the Instructions.txt file for help. Play the game from DESKTOP SHORTCUT or install directory. ALWAYS OPEN THE GAME USING RUN AS ADMINISTRATOR
